Statement.Sql: INSERT INTO REPORT(mCongregation,mPublisher,mYear,mMonth,mDate, mSendDate,mNoActivity,mPlacements,mVideoShowings,mHours,mReturnVisits,mBibleStudies,mRbcHours,mIncludeAllHours,mRemarks,mType,mPartialHours) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE mSendDate=?,mNoActivity=?,mPlacements=?,mVideoShowings=?,mHours=?,mReturnVisits=?,mBibleStudies=?,mRbcHours=?,mIncludeAllHours=?,mRemarks=?,mType=?,mPartialHours=?,mUpdated=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
SELECT r.* FROM PERSON p, REPORT r where mLocater like ? and mLocater not like "%f0,%" and p.mId=r.mPublisher and r.mCongregation=?
SELECT * FROM REPORT where mCongregation=? and mPublisher=?
SELECT * FROM REPORT where mCongregation=? and mDate between ? and ?
SELECT * FROM REPORT where mCongregation=? and mPublisher=? and mDate between ? and ?
SELECT * FROM REPORT where mCongregation=? and mPublisher=? and mDate >= ?
